processFlow.title: Current Security Responce Flow
processFlow.contentText: Ryder System prides itself on maintaining their system secure. Although security is a priority, the response flow for a security breach is somewhat limited (Ludwig, 2017).

processFlow.title: Sleeper Tractor Rental
processFlow.contentText: Example of Ryder’s heavy-duty long haul sleeper tractor which companies may lease (Ryder System, 2019).

processFlow.title: Medium-duty Commercial Truck
processFlow.contentText: Example of Ryder’s medium duty truck, which competes with U-Haul in the commercial and residential markets (Ryder System, 2019).

businessModel.title: Proposed Security Responce Flow
businessModel.contentText: By employing a powerful artificial intelligence (AI), the system can intercept security breaches in real-time, this leading to a much higher success rate of prevention.

businessModel.title: Average Cost of US Security Breach
businessModel.contentText: The calculated cost of US security breaches (Sydny Shepard, 2018).

references.ref: The calculated cost of US security breaches (Ludwig, S. (2017, May 02). How Ryder System Focuses on Incident Prevention for Security Success. Retrieved from https://www.securitymagazine.com/articles/87990-how-ryder-systems-focuses-on-incident-prevention-for-security-success
Ryder System. (2019). Sleeper Tractor Rental. Retrieved from https://reservations.ryder.com/en/rental-vehicles/tractor-rentals/sleeper-tractor
Sydny Shepard, 2. (2018). The Average Cost of a Data Breach. Retrieved from https://securitytoday.com/articles/2018/07/17/the-average-cost-of-a-data-breach.aspx Sydny Shepard, 2018).
